Body:
nqubits = 1
p = Program('Echo', platf, nqubits)
times = np.linspace(0, 20000.0, 61)
times = np.linspace(0, 60, 61)
p.set_sweep_points(times)
for tau in times:
    n = 'echo_tau_{}ns'.format(tau)
    n = n.replace('.', '_')
    k = Kernel(n, platf, nqubits)
    k.prepz(0)
    k.rx90(0)
    for j in range(int(tau / 2)):
        k.gate('i', [0])
    k.rx180(0)
    for j in range(int(tau / 2)):
        k.gate('i', [0])
    k.rx90(0)
    k.measure(0)
    p.add_kernel(k)
p.compile()
QISA_fn = os.path.join(output_dir, p.name + '.qisa')
assemble(QISA_fn)
